SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Your Slack app's Signing Secret from [api.slack.com/apps](https://api.slack.com/apps) → Your App → Basic Information

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Slack Bot User OAuth Token from [api.slack.com/apps](https://api.slack.com/apps) → Your App → OAuth & Permissions (starts with `xoxb-`)

SLACK_BOT_USER_ID.description: Your Slack bot's User ID (find it by mentioning your bot in Slack and checking the link)
